language.entry: The War Machine

What once was but a far fetch blueprint found in the Ancestor’s Estate, it’s now brought to motion by the ingenious mechanics at Monsieur Musc’s workshop. Use this hulking walking war machine to bring a destructive end to the Enemies.
New Production
More gears to the grind. More irons to the anvil.
